title: South Africa to Resume Kruger Park Day Visits on Better Weather
description: Day visitation to South Africa’s iconic Kruger National Park will resume on Monday on better weather conditions following the devastation caused by deadly floods last week.
content: Day visitation to South Africa’s iconic Kruger National Park will resume on Monday on better weather conditions following the devastation caused by deadly floods last week.
